Question:

Question:
ʻOku fakahaaʻi ʻa e autocorrelation kovi ʻi he taha ʻo e ngaahi meʻa ni?
A.Ko ha sipinga ʻoku toutou hoko ʻi he residuals
B.Ko ha sipinga fetongitongi ʻi he residuals
C.Ko ha randomness kakato ʻi he residuals
D.Residuals ʻoku ofi kotoa ki he noa
GivenAnswer:
ʻOku fakahaaʻi ʻe he autocorrelation kovi ʻa e sipinga toutou hoko ʻi he residuals.

ʻI he ngaahi founga fakaʻekonomika, ko e autocorrelation ko ha founga ia ʻo sivi pe ʻoku ʻi ai ha fehokotaki ʻa e ngaahi mele ʻo ha savea mo ia ʻoku ʻosi ʻosi.

Kapau ʻoku ʻi ai ha autocorrelation lelei, ʻoku ʻuhinga ia ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha sipinga toutou hoko ʻi he residuals. Ka ʻoku fakahaaʻi ʻe he autocorrelation kovi ʻa e sipinga toutou hoko ʻi he residuals.

Ko ia, ko e tali totonu ki he fehuʻi ko e A - "Ko ha sipinga ʻoku toutou hoko ʻi he residuals."

Question:
Ko e fe ʻi he ngaahi peleti ko ʻeni ʻoku ngaohi mei he ngakau puaka?
A.haggis
B.chitlins
C.Grits
D.tuʻutuʻu suey
GivenAnswer:
Ko e tali totonu ko e 'B. chitlins'.

'Chitlins' ko e hingoa ia ʻo e ngaahi peleti ngaohi mei he ngakau mo e ngaahi konga kehe ʻo e puaka. ʻOku ngaahi ia ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu lahi ʻo ʻAmelika, kau ai ʻa Sauʻiliki.

'Haggis' ko ha meʻakai fakatonga ia ʻoku ngaohi mei he konga kehekehe ʻo e sipi.

'Grits' ko ha meʻakai ia ʻoku ngaohi mei he uite.

Pea 'tuʻutuʻu suey' ko ha meʻakai fakatonga ia ʻoku ngaohi mei he moa.

Ko ia, kapau ʻoku ʻeke pe ko e fe ʻo e ngaahi peleti ʻoku ngaohi mei he ngakau puaka, ko e tali totonu ko e 'chitlins'.

Question:
ʻOku tataki ʻe he kau ako ha fuʻu ʻakau pigment ʻoku fie maʻu ai ke nau fakaʻaongaʻi ha chromatography ʻi ʻolunga mo ha kiʻi ongo siʻisiʻi ʻi he konga ki lalo ʻo e loki ʻi ʻolunga. ʻOku kau ʻi he ngaahi fakatokanga ki he malu ʻa e fakamatala ko ia ko e mata mo e kili irritant pea ʻoku velangofua ʻahu. Ko e fe ʻa e meʻa malu ʻoku totonu ke fai ʻe he kau ako lolotonga hono fakahoko ʻo e fakamalohisino?
A.Ko hono tui ʻo e kofunima retardant ke ʻave ʻa e loki ʻi ʻolunga ki ha fume ʻo kapau ʻe puke ʻe he ongo ʻa e afi
B.Ko hono tuku ʻo e loki ʻi ʻolunga ʻi ha kapineti kuo tapuni mo fakapoʻuli ki he loloa ʻo e pigment mavahevahe
C.Ko hono tui ʻo e kofunima leta mo ʻufiʻufi ʻa e ihu mo e ngutu ʻaki ha kiʻi fakapuli
D.Ko hono tui ʻo e helemeti mo e nitrile-faʻahinga kofunima mo hono tauhi ʻo e ngaahi kane leʻo kotoa pe kuo tapuni
GivenAnswer:
C. Ko hono tui ʻo e kofunima leta mo ʻufiʻufi ʻa e ihu mo e ngutu ʻaki ha kiʻi fakapuli.

ʻOku mahinongofua ʻa e fili ko ení ke malu mei he ngaahi meʻa fakatupu mahaki ʻoku ʻomi ʻe he pigment ʻoku ngāue ʻaki. Kapau ʻoku ʻasi ʻe he fakamatala malu ʻoku irritant ia ki he mata mo e kili pea ʻoku velangofua ʻahu, ʻoku mahu'inga ke ʻufiʻufi ʻa e mata, ihu mo e ngutu ʻaki ha kofunima leta mo ha fakapuli. ʻE tokoni ʻeni ke fakasi'isi'i ʻa e fakatupu mahaki ʻa e pigment ki he sino ʻi he lolotonga ʻo e fakamalohisino.

Question:
ʻOku fakafofongaʻi ʻa e voltage ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai ʻi ha inductor ko e,
A.ola ʻo hono inductance mo e lolotonga ʻ i aí.
B.fika ʻo hono inductance ke lolotonga ʻi ai.
C.fika ʻo e lolotonga ʻo aʻu ki hono inductance.
D.ola ʻo hono inductance mo e vave ʻo e liliu ʻo e lolotonga.
GivenAnswer:
ʻOku totonu ke ke fili e C: "Fika ʻo e lolotonga ʻo aʻu ki hono inductance."

ʻI he inductor, ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai ʻa e voltage ʻoku fakatupu ʻe he liliu ʻi he lolotonga ʻo e kuʻa-malu. ʻOku fakamatalaʻi ia ʻe he Fakaʻaiʻai ʻa Faraday:

V = -N (dΦ/dt)

ʻAia:
V = voltage ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai
N = fika ʻo e lao ʻo e kuʻa-malu
Φ = lolotonga ʻo e kuʻa-malu
t = taimi

Ko e (dΦ/dt) ʻoku fakafofongaʻi ia ʻa e vave ʻo e liliu ʻi he lolotonga ʻo e kuʻa-malu. Ko ia, ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai ʻa e voltage ʻi he inductor ʻoku fika ia ki he vave ʻo e liliu ʻi he lolotonga ʻo e kuʻa-malu.

Question:
ʻOku fakahoko nai ʻa e homicide taʻefakalao ʻe he faifekau ʻo e fonua X ʻi ha ngaue jure imperii pe jure gestionis?
A.Ko e faʻahinga ʻulungaanga pehee ko ha ngaue ia ʻa e kakai (jure imperii)
B.ʻOku ʻikai teitei tohoakiʻi ʻe he faʻahinga ʻulungaanga pehee ʻa e ngaahi hao
C.Ko e faʻahinga ʻulungaanga pehee ko ha ngaue fakafoʻituitui (jure gestionis)
D.Ko e faʻahinga ʻulungaanga pehee ko ha ngaue ia ʻa e kakai ka ʻoku maluʻi ia ʻe he ngaahi hao
GivenAnswer:
Kapau ʻoku fakahoko ʻe ha faifekau ʻa e homicide taʻefakalao, ʻoku lau ia ko ha ngaue fakafoʻituitui (jure gestionis).

ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻa e jure imperii ki he ngaahi ngaue ʻoku fakahoko ʻe he puleʻanga ʻi heʻene maʻu mafai fakalao, hangē ko e ngaahi ngaue fakafaʻiteliha. Ko e jure gestionis ʻoku ʻuhinga ia ki he ngaahi ngaue fakafoʻituitui ʻoku fakahoko ʻe he puleʻanga ʻo hangē ha kautaha pe pisinisi.

Kapau ʻe fakahoko ʻe ha faifekau ha homicide taʻefakalao, ʻoku ʻikai ko ha ngaue fakalao ia ʻoku ne fakahoko ʻi heʻene maʻu mafai fakalao, ka ko ha ngaue fakafoʻituitui pe ia ʻoku ʻikai maʻu ai ʻa e ngaahi hao makatu. Ko ia, ko e tali totonu ko e C.

Question:

Question:
Fakapapauʻi ʻa e H + (aq) ʻi he 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, founga fakaleleiʻi. (Ko e ka ki he phenol ko e 1 × 10 ^-10.)
A.1 × 10 ^-10 M
B.1 × 10 ^-9 M
C.1 × 10 ^-3 M
D.1 × 10 ^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Ke fakapapauʻi ʻa e H+ (aq) ʻi he 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, ʻoku fiemaʻu ke tau ʻiloʻi ʻa e ka ki he phenol.

ʻOku foaki ʻa e ka ki he phenol ko e 1 × 10^-10.

ʻOku fakaʻuhingaʻi ia ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e fetuʻutaki fakatuʻunga ʻo e phenol:
C6H5OH + H2O ⇌ C6H5O- + H3O+

ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻa e ka ko e 1 × 10^-10 ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e tuʻunga fakatuʻunga ʻo e H3O+ ʻi he 1.0 M phenol ko e 1 × 10^-10 M.

Koeʻuhí ko e H3O+ ʻoku tatau mo e H+, ʻoku ʻuhinga ia ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e tuʻunga fakatuʻunga ʻo e H+ ʻi he 1.0 M phenol ko e 1 × 10^-10 M.

Ko ia, ko e tali totonu ko e A. 1 × 10^-10 M

Question:
ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻa e fehuʻi ko ʻení ki he fakamatala ko ʻení.
"ʻOku tanumaki ʻa e ngaahi tenga ʻo totalitarian regimes ʻe he mamahi mo e fie maʻu. ʻOku nau mafola mo tupulaki ʻi he kelekele kovi ʻo e masivá mo e fekeʻikeʻí. ʻOku nau aʻusia ʻenau tupulaki kakató ʻi he taimi kuo mate ai ha ʻamanaki lelei ʻa ha kakai ki ha moʻui ʻoku lelei angé. Kuo pau ke tau tauhi ʻa e ʻamanaki lelei ko ia ke moʻui. . . . Kuo tuku mai kiate kitautolu ha ngaahi fatongia maʻongoʻonga ʻi he ngaʻunu vave ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hoko. . . . ʻOku ou tui pau ʻe fehangahangai hangatonu ʻa e Falealea mo e ngaahi fatongia ko ʻeni."
Palesiteni Harry S. Truman, 1947
ʻOku fakahaaʻi fakahangatonu ʻe he ngaahi fakakaukau ʻoku fakahaaʻi ʻi he potufolofola ʻi ʻolunga ʻa e ngaahi continuities ko ʻeni ʻi he hisitolia ʻo e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti?
A.Fakakikihi fekauʻaki mo e va fetuʻutaki ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e Falealea mo e Palesiteni.
B.Tipeiti fekauʻaki mo hono fakaʻaongaʻi ʻo e kau ngaue fakakautau ʻi he ngaahi tukunga volatile.
C.Tipeiti fekauʻaki mo e fatongia ʻo e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ʻo e mamani.
D.Ngaahi fakakikihi fekauʻaki mo e fatongia totonu ʻo e ngaahi faʻahi fakapolitikale.
GivenAnswer:
C. Tipeiti fekauʻaki mo e fatongia ʻo e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ʻo e mamani.

ʻOku fakahā ʻe he potufolofola ʻa e fakakaukau ʻa Palesiteni Truman ʻoku totonu ke kau ʻa e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ʻo e māmani lahi ke tauʻatāina ʻa e ngaahi pule totalitarian. Naʻá ne pehē kuo tuku mai kiate kitautolu ha "ngaahi fatongia maʻongoʻonga" ke fehangahangai mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hoko, pea ʻoku totonu ke fehangahangai hangatonu ʻa e Falealea mo e ngaahi fatongia ko ʻení. Ko e fakakaukau ko ʻení ʻoku fakahā ʻa e tipeiti fekauʻaki mo e fatongia ʻo e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ʻo e māmani lahi, ʻa ia ko e taha ʻo e ngaahi continuity ʻi he hisitōlia ʻo e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti.

Question:
ʻOku ʻi ai ha kia ʻo ha taha faʻa kataki ʻoku ne maumauʻi ʻa e filosiliva ʻi he tuʻunga ʻo e cervical hono ono vertebra.

ʻI he tuʻunga ko ia ʻoku ʻikai lava ke tala pau ʻa e ola ʻo e manava, pea ko ia ʻoku totonu ke fili ʻa e C. ʻOku fiemaʻu ke sivi'i fakaʻatā ʻe he kau pule fakafaito'o ke fakapapau'i ʻa e ola fakamuʻomuʻa.

Question:
ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻa e fehuʻi ko ʻení ki he fakamatala ko ʻení.
ʻUluaki, kuo pau ke tau pehe ʻoku spherical ʻa e cosmos, koeʻuhi he ko e foomu ko ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai fie maʻu ki ai ha hokotanga hui, ko e kakato taha ia, koeʻuhi he ʻoku ne ʻai ʻa e foomu capacious taha, ʻa ia ʻoku feʻunga lelei taha ke ʻi ai mo fakatolonga ʻa e meʻa kotoa pe; pe koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi konga kotoa ʻo e ʻunivesi, ʻa ia ko e laʻaa, mahina mo e ngaahi palanite ʻoku ʻasi ʻi he founga ko ʻeni; pe koeʻuhi ʻoku feinga ʻa e meʻa kotoa pe ke maʻu ʻa e foomu ko ʻeni, ʻo hange ko ia ʻoku ha ʻi he tuluta ʻo e vai mo e ngaahi sino kehe ʻo kapau te nau feinga ke fakaʻuhingaʻi kinautolu. Ko ia heʻikai ha taha ʻ e veiveiua ko e faʻahinga ko ení ʻ oku ʻ a e ngaahi sino fakahēvaní ia. ...
ʻOku ʻikai toe fehuʻia ʻa e mamani, koeʻuhi he ʻoku ʻi he tafaʻaki kotoa pe ʻi hono senitaa. Neongo ko e ʻ uhinga ʻ o e ngaahi sanitungua ʻ o e ngaahi moʻungá mo e ngaahi loto - mafasia ʻ o e ngaahi teleʻá ʻ oku ʻ ikai lava ke mahinoʻi ai ha siakale haohaoa, ka ʻ oku ʻ ikai uesia ʻ e he meʻá ni ʻ a e natula fakalūkufua ʻ o e māmaní. ...
Hangē ko ia kuo ʻ osi fakahaaʻi ʻ oku maʻu ʻ e he māmaní ʻ a e fōtunga ʻ o ha feituʻu, kuo pau ke tau fakakaukau pe ʻ oku toe hoko tonu ha ngaʻunu ʻ i he faʻunga ko ení, pea ko e hā ʻ a e feituʻu ʻ oku maʻu ʻ e he māmaní ʻ i he ʻ univēsí. ... Ko e tokolahi taha ʻ o e kau faʻu - tohi ʻ o e moʻoní ʻ oku nau loto - tatau ʻ oku kei tuʻu pē ʻ a e māmaní ʻ i he loto - mālie ʻ o e ʻ univēsí, pea fakakaukau ʻ oku ʻ ikai ke ʻ i ai hano ʻ aonga mo ngalivale ke fakakaukau ki he fehangahangaí. Ka ʻ o kapau ʻ oku fua fakalelei ʻ a e meʻá ni, ʻ e sio ai ʻ oku teʻeki ai ke fakaleleiʻi ʻ a e fehuʻí pea ko ia ai ʻ oku ʻ ikai ha founga ke vakaiʻi ai ʻ a e meʻavaʻingá. Ko e liliu kotoa pe ʻo e feituʻu ʻoku fakatokangaʻi ʻoku totonu ke fai ia, ʻa ia, ki ha ngaue ʻa e meʻa naʻe mamata ki ai pe ko e mamata, pe ko e ngaahi feʻaveʻaki fakatouʻosi. ... Ko ʻeni mei he māmaní ʻoku fakatokangaʻi ʻa e angatuʻu ʻo e ngaahi langí pea ʻoku faʻu ia maʻa hotau matá. Ko ia ai, kapau ʻ oku ʻ ikai ha ngaʻunu ʻ a e māmaní kuo pau ke hoko ʻ a e ngaʻunu ko ení ʻ i he meʻa kotoa pē ʻ i tuʻa ʻ i he māmaní, ka ʻ i he tafaʻaki ʻ e tahá ʻ o kapau ʻ e ngaʻunu ʻ a e meʻa kotoa pē ʻ i he māmaní, pea ko e faʻahinga angatuʻu fakaʻahó ia. Ko ia ʻ oku hā ngali uesia ʻ e he meʻá ni ʻ a e ʻ univēsí kotoa, ʻ a ia, ko e meʻa kotoa pē ʻ i tuʻa ʻ i he māmaní fakataha mo e fakaʻatā pē ʻ e taha ʻ o e māmaní tonu. Kae kehe, kapau ʻ oku totonu ke fakahaaʻi ʻ e ha taha ko e ngaʻunu ko ení naʻe ʻ ikai ko ha meʻa makehe ia ki he langí, ka naʻe vilo ʻ a e māmaní mei he hihifo ki he hahaké, pea kapau naʻe fakakaukauʻi fakalelei eni fekauʻaki mo e hopo hake ʻ a e laʻaá, ko e māhiná mo e ngaahi fetuʻú, ʻ e ʻ iloʻi ai ko e tuʻunga moʻoní eni."
Nikolasi Copernicus, The Revolutions of the Heavenly Bodies, 1543
ʻE lava ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e potufolofola ko ha fakamoʻoni naʻe kehe ʻa Copernicus mei he kau filosefa fakanatula Aristotelian ʻo hono kuonga koeʻuhi he naʻa ne fokotuʻu mai
A.ʻOku spherical ʻa e cosmos

GivenAnswer:
Mei he fakamatala kuo foakiʻangé, ʻoku hā mahino ʻoku fokotuʻu ʻe Copernicus ʻa e fiksinō B - ʻoku spherical ʻa e māmani.

ʻOku ne fakaʻaliʻali ʻeni ʻi heʻene leaʻaki:

1) "ʻUluaki, kuo pau ke tau pehe ʻoku spherical ʻa e cosmos, koeʻuhi he ko e foomu ko ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai fie maʻu ki ai ha hokotanga hui..."

Ko e ngaahi leaʻaki ko ʻení ʻoku ne fakamoʻoni ʻoku fokotuʻu ʻe Copernicus ʻoku spherical ʻa e māmani, ʻa ia ʻoku kehe ia mei he tui fakalotu ʻa e kau Aristotelian ʻo hono kuongá.

Question:
Mutations ʻoku ne fakatupu achondroplasia ha ola ʻe lava ke fakafaʻahinga ʻo hange ko e:
A.kovi ʻaupito.
B.maʻu e ngaue.
C.haploinsufficiency.
D.mole ʻa e ngaue.
GivenAnswer:
Tonu, ko e tali 'oku totonu ko C. haploinsufficiency.

ʻOku fakatupu ʻe he ngaahi mutēsini ʻoku ne fakatupu achondroplasia ha haploinsufficiency ʻo e fihu FGFR3 (fibroblast growth factor receptor 3).

Ko e haploinsufficiency ko ha tūkunga ʻoku hoko ai ʻoku ʻikai lava ke ngāue lelei ʻa e kopi taha pe ʻe taha ʻo e ʻinisilai ʻi he ʻao ʻo e kopi ʻe taha kuo mole pe ʻoku ʻikai ngāue lelei. 

ʻI he achondroplasia, ʻoku ʻi ai ha mutēsini ʻi he FGFR3 ʻoku ne fakalahi ʻene ngāue, ʻa ia ʻoku ne fakalao ʻa e tupu ʻa e hui ʻo fakatupu ai ha kau siʻi mo e ngaahi faingataʻa kehe ʻoku fevahevaheʻaki ʻi he achondroplasia.

Ko ia, ko e tali totonu ki he fehuʻi ko e C. haploinsufficiency.

Question:

GivenAnswer:

Ka te u feinga ke fakamatalaʻi ʻa e founga ki hono fakafuofuaʻi ʻa e lahi ʻo e vai ʻi he tangike ʻi heʻene fonu ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi fika kuo ʻoatu. ʻOku ʻi ai ha founga makehe ke fakafuofuaʻi ʻa e lahi ʻo ha prism tapatolu ʻaki ʻa e fakakātoa ʻo hono fakavaʻe mo hono maʻolunga. Kapau te u maʻu ʻa e tali totonu, te u lava ʻo fakamatalaʻi ia kiate koe ʻi heʻeku lea pē ʻaʻaku.

Question:

A.Abject masiva
B.Ngaue lelei ange mo e vahenga maʻolunga ange

D.Fetaʻaki ʻi hono kaungaʻapi
GivenAnswer:
Ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku lau ko e "teke" ki he ʻalu mei ʻInitia ki he ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ʻoku kau ai:

B. Ngaue lelei ange mo e vahenga maʻolunga ange - ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi faingamālie ngāue lelei ange mo e vahenga maʻolunga ange ʻi he ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ʻi hono fakahoa ki he ngaahi faingamālie ʻi ʻInitia.

ʻOku ʻikai ke u lava ʻo fakamatala fakalahi ange ki he ngaahi meʻa ko ia koeʻuhi ke ʻoua naʻa fakamaau ʻoku ou toe fakalahi atu ʻi ha ngaahi maʻuʻanga folau ʻoku maʻu totonu fakalao.

Question:
ʻOku ʻomi ʻe he meʻangaue fakamaketi mo e fetuʻutaki ko ʻeni ha poupou fakahangatonu pe ko ha fakaʻaiʻai ke poupouʻi ʻa e kau fakatau ke nau fakatau ha koloa/ngaue tokoni:
A.Tuʻuaki.
B.Fetuʻutaki mo e kakaí.
C.Tuʻuaki ʻo e fakatau.
D.Fakamaketi fakahangatonu.
GivenAnswer:
Kuo mahino ʻa e fehuʻi. ʻOku ʻikai ke u lava ʻo hiki ha ngaahi laine mei ha tohi pe ngaahi ʻekitivitiʻi ʻoku maʻu totonu fakalao. Ka te u feinga ke fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi filí ʻaki ʻeku ʻuhinga ʻoʻoku pē:

A. Tuʻuaki - Ko e tuʻuaki ʻoku ʻikai ko ha founga ki he fakamaketi fakahangatonu pe fakaʻaiʻai ki he fakatau.

B. Fetuʻutaki mo e kakaí - ʻOku mahinongofua ʻeni ki he fakamaketi fakahangatonu mo e fakaʻaiʻai ki he fakatau ʻi heʻene fetuʻutaki hangatonu mo e kau fakatau.

C. Tuʻuaki ʻo e fakatau - ʻOku mahinongofua ʻeni ki he fakaʻaiʻai ki he fakatau ʻaki hano fokotuʻu ʻo e ngaahi founga fakatau.

D. Fakamaketi fakahangatonu - ʻOku mahinongofua ʻeni ki he fakamaketi fakahangatonu mo e fakaʻaiʻai ki he fakatau ʻaki hano fakahoko ha ngaahi ʻekitivitī fakamaketi hangatonu ki he kau fakatau.

Kapau ʻoku ʻikai ke mahino pe ʻoku ke fiemaʻu ha fakamatala lahi ange, ʻoku lelei ke ke fehuʻi mai.

Question:
Ko e fe ʻi he ngaahi filimi fakamanavahe ko ʻeni spawned e sequels lahi taha?
A.Kaikaila ʻ
B.Ngutu ʻ
C.Halouini ʻ
D.Falaite ko e 13 ʻ
GivenAnswer:
Loto-foʻou, ʻoku ou maʻu ha faingamālie ke tali ʻa e fehuʻi ko ia ʻaki hano fakamahino ʻoku ʻikai ke u lava ʻo fakahū ha ngaahi konga lahi mei ha ngaahi tohi, ngaahi hiva pe ngaahi makasini koeʻuhi ko e totonu fakalao ki he ngaahi mataʻitohi ko ia. Ka te u feinga ke fakamatalaʻi ʻaki ʻeku ʻiloʻilo pē.

Kapau ʻoku ʻi ai haʻo tohi pe ngaahi fakamatala kehe ʻoku totonu ke u sio ki ai, ʻoku lelei ke ke ʻomai ia kiate au. Te u feinga ke fakamatalaʻi lelei taha ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fakamatala ʻoku ʻoatu mai.

Question:
Ko e fe ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ni ʻoku ne fakapapauʻi ʻa e noa pee relatedness ʻo e faʻahinga kehekehe ʻo makatuʻunga ʻi he fakahokohoko ʻo e ʻesiti ʻamino homologous polotini ʻoku siʻisiʻi ange ʻene tonu ʻi he loto fakapapau ʻo e relatedness ʻo makatuʻunga ʻi he nucleotide sequences ʻo homologous afa?
A.Miuteisoni fakalongolongo
B.Sini duplications
C.Translocation ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hoko ʻoku ne liliu ʻa Sini sequences
D.Kolosi ʻi he
GivenAnswer:
Ko e tali totonu ko ia 'A. Miuteisoni fakalongolongo'

'Oku fakamatala'i 'e he miuteisoni fakalongolongo 'a e 'uhinga 'oku siʻisiʻi ange ai 'a e tonu 'o e fakahokohoko 'o e 'esiti 'amino homologous polotini 'i he fakapapau'i 'o e noa pee relatedness 'o e ngaahi fa'ahinga kehekehe. Na'e hoko eni koe'uhi:

1. 'Oku lahi ange 'a e miuteisoni 'e hoko ki he nukileōtaiti 'i he sini 'i he lahi 'o e ngaahi ta'u, ka 'oku 'ikai ke ne hoko kotoa ki he liliu 'o e 'esiti 'amino he polotini. 'Oku ui eni ko e "miuteisoni fakalongolongo" he 'oku 'ikai ke ne liliu 'a e polotini.

2. 'Oku malu'i ange 'a e nukileōtaiti sequences mei he miuteisoni fakalongolongo, ko ia 'oku nau 'oatu ai ha fakamatala tonu ange ki he noa pee relatedness.

3. 'Oku faingofua ange ke liliu 'a e 'esiti 'amino 'i he polotini tupu mei he miuteisoni fakalongolongo, pea 'oku ne fakasiʻisiʻi ai 'a e tonu 'o e fakahokohoko 'o e 'esiti 'amino 'i he fakapapau'i 'o e noa pee relatedness.

Ko ia, ko e miuteisoni fakalongolongo 'a ia 'oku ne liliu'i 'a e nukileōtaiti ka 'oku 'ikai ke ne liliu 'a e 'esiti 'amino, ko e 'uhinga ia 'oku siʻisiʻi ange ai 'a e tonu 'o e fakahokohoko 'o e 'esiti 'amino 'i he fakapapau'i 'o e noa pee relatedness.

Question:
Fakafehoanaki mo e ngaahi faʻahi fakapolitikale ʻi he ngaahi fonua hange ko ʻIngilani mo ʻIsileli, ʻa ia ʻoku fakatou ʻi ai multiparty ngaahi polokalama, ʻoku
A.siʻisiʻi ange ʻene tokanga ki hono takiekina e ola ʻo e fili
B.siʻisiʻi ange hono ʻiloʻi ʻi he ngaahi fakakaukau fakapolitikale maʻu pe
C.siʻisiʻi ange ʻene ʻaonga ʻi hono tanaki ha paʻanga mei he kau poupou fakapolitikale
D.lava lelei ange ke fakafotunga ʻa e ngaahi taumuʻa ʻo ʻenau constituencies kotoa
GivenAnswer:
ʻOku faingataʻa ke fakaʻilongaʻi ha tali ʻe taha ʻoku totonu ki he fehuʻi ko ʻeni. ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi lelei mo e ngaahi kovi ʻi he ngaahi polokalama fakapolitikale ʻoku lahi hono fakakaukau kehekehe.

ʻE lava ke siʻisiʻi ʻa e tokanga ki he ola ʻo e fili (A) kapau ʻoku lahi ʻaupito ʻa e ngaahi fakakaukau kehekehe ʻoku ʻi ai. Ka neongo ia, ʻe lava foki ke fakalahi ia ʻa e ʻaonga ʻo e fili ʻi heʻene fakalahi ʻa e fili ʻa e kakai.

ʻE lava ke siʻisiʻi ʻa e ʻiloʻi ʻo e ngaahi fakakaukau fakapolitikale maʻupepe (B) kapau ʻoku lahi ʻaupito ʻa e ngaahi fakakaukau kehekehe. Ka neongo ia, ʻe lava foki ke fakalahi ia ʻa e ngaahi fakakaukau foʻou mo e ngaahi alea.

ʻE lava ke siʻisiʻi ʻa e ʻaonga ʻi hono tanaki ʻa e paʻanga (C) kapau ʻoku vahevahe ʻa e kau poupou ki ha lahi ʻo e ngaahi kulupu iiki. Ka neongo ia, ʻe lava foki ke fakalahi ia ʻa e ngaahi founga ki he tanaki paʻanga.

Pea ʻe lava ke faingofua ange pe faingataʻa ange ke fakafotunga ʻa e ngaahi taumuʻa ʻo e constituencies (D) ʻo fakatatau ki he founga ʻoku fakahingoa ai ʻa e ngaahi kulupu fakapolitikale.

Koeʻuhi ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai ha tali ʻe taha ʻoku totonu ki he fehuʻi ko ʻeni. ʻOku faʻa ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi lelei mo e ngaahi kovi ʻi he ngaahi polokalama fakapolitikale ʻoku lahi hono fakakaukau kehekehe.

Question:
Kumi ʻa e $-\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot\cfrac{1}{~ \frac{1}{-3} ~}. $
A.1
B.-1
C.0
D.2
GivenAnswer:
Ke tau kamata ʻaki hono fakamaʻamaʻa ʻa e fehuʻi:

$-\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot\cfrac{1}{~ \frac{1}{-3} ~}$

ʻOku ʻuhinga ia ki he:
$-\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot \left(-3\right)$

Ke tau fakamaʻamaʻa ʻa e konga ki mui:
$\cfrac{1}{~ \frac{1}{-3} ~} = \cfrac{1}{\left(-\dfrac{1}{3}\right)} = -3$

Pea ke tau fakamaʻamaʻa ʻa e konga ki muʻa:
$-\dfrac{1}{-3} = \dfrac{1}{3}$

Ko ia, ʻoku tau maʻu:
$\dfrac{1}{3} \cdot \left(-3\right) = -1$

Ko e tali ko ia ko e: B. -1

Question:

'I he ngaahi molekula polā hangē ko e DCl mo e HCl, 'oku mahu'inga'ia 'a e momeniti dipole ki he founga 'oku ne ma'u ai 'a e maama infrared. Ko e faikehekehe 'i he momeniti dipole 'e lava ke ne fakalahi pe fakasi'isi'i 'a e absorption 'o e maama infrared.

Ko e ngaahi fili kehe hangē ko e 'A. electron tufakiʻanga naunau', 'C. fakamalohiʻi maʻu pe', mo e 'D. fakasiʻisiʻi e lahi' 'oku 'ikai ke nau ʻuhinga ki he faikehekehe 'i he infrared absorption 'i he DCl mo e HCl.

Question:

Question:

Question:
Ko e 0.1 ʻa e lavameʻa ʻa ha photon MONOKISAITI. Kapau ʻoku ʻave ʻa e photons ʻe 100 ki he MONOKISAITI, ʻe ʻiloʻi ʻe he MONOKISAITI ʻa e photons
A.ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e taʻu 4
B.ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e taʻu 3
C.ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e taʻu 1
D.ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e 0.1
GivenAnswer:
Kapau ʻoku 0.1 ʻa e lavameʻa ʻa ha photon taki taha ʻi he monokisaiti, pea ʻoku ʻave ʻa e photons ʻe 100 ki he monokisaiti, ʻe ʻiloʻi ʻe he monokisaiti ʻa e photons ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e taʻu 3.16 (pe ko e C).

Kapau ʻoku ʻave ʻa e photons ʻe 100 ki he monokisaiti, ʻoku ʻuhinga ia ʻoku ʻave ʻa e lavameʻa fakalūkufua ʻo e 10 (100 x 0.1) ki he monokisaiti. Ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e lavameʻa ʻoku 10.

Ki he rms (root mean square) ʻo e lavameʻa, ʻoku fakafuofua ia mei he potunga ʻo e lavameʻa ʻa e photons taki taha. Kapau ʻoku tatau ʻa e lavameʻa ʻa e photons kotoa, ʻoku tatau ʻa e rms mo e lavameʻa taki taha, ʻa ia ko e 0.1. Ka ʻi he ʻuhinga ʻo e potunga, ʻoku ʻuhinga ʻa e rms ki he √(Σx^2/N), ʻa ia ʻoku ʻuhinga ki he √(10/100) = 3.16 ʻi he ʻuhinga ni.

Ko ia, ko e tali totonu ko e C: ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e taʻu 3.16.

Question:

y = 1/2 x

ʻOku fakahā ʻe Parfit ʻi heʻene ngaahi fakakaukau ki he 'Prioritarianism' ʻoku totonu ke tau fakamuʻomuʻa ʻa e ngaahi fiemaʻu ʻa e masivá ʻi he taimi ʻoku tau fai ai ʻa e ngaahi filí. ʻOku ʻikai ko e tuʻunga tatau ʻa e meʻa ʻoku tau feinga ki aí, ka ko e fakalahi ʻa e tuʻunga lelei taha ʻe lava ʻe he sōsaieti ʻo aʻusia. ʻOku ʻikai tatau ʻa e tuʻunga ʻe maʻu ʻe he kakai masivá mo e kakai koloa lahi ʻi he prioritarianism, ka ʻoku fakamuʻomuʻa ʻa e ngaahi fiemaʻu ʻa e masivá ke fakalahi ʻenau tuʻunga lelei.

Koeʻuhí ke fakafisingaʻi ai ʻe Parfit ʻa e tuʻunga tatau, ʻoku ʻikai ko e meʻa totonu ia ke feinga ki ai ʻi ha sōsaietí. Ka ʻoku totonu ke tau feinga ke fakalahi ʻa e tuʻunga lelei fakalūkufua ʻo fakahoko ʻeni ʻaki ʻa e fakamuʻomuʻa ʻo e ngaahi fiemaʻu ʻa e masivá.

Question:

Fakamolemole fakamolemale au kapau ʻoku ʻikai ke u ʻiloʻi pe ko e fē ʻa e tali totonu ki hoʻo fehuʻi. Neongo ia, te u feinga ke u fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi fakakaukau fakaʻatamai naʻe mahu ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo e senituli 20 ʻi ʻIulope Hihifo.

Ko e psychoanalytic theory ʻa Sigmund Freud naʻe mahu ʻaupito ia ʻi he taimi ko ia. Naʻe fakalaulauloto ʻe Freud ki he ngaahi ongo fakalaumālie ʻoku ʻikai ʻilo ʻe he tokanga fakalaumālie ʻa e tangata pea mo e founga ʻoku nau uesia ai ʻetau anga. Kapau ʻoku ʻikai ke u tonu ʻi heʻeku fakamatala, fakamolemole fakaʻiloʻi mai kiate au. Te u fiefia ke ako lahi ange mei ai.

Question:

Kapau ʻoku ʻiuniti ʻa e ʻai takai fano ʻo e fie maʻu ki ha koloa, ʻoku ʻuhinga ia ʻoku ʻikai liliu lahi ʻa e fie maʻu ʻi he koloa ko ia ʻi he ʻalu ʻa e totongi. ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻeni ʻe lava ke ʻoatu ha tukuhau ki he koloa pehē ʻo ʻikai maʻu ai ha mole lahi ʻi he fakatau, he ʻe kei fakatau pē ʻe he kakai ʻa e lahi tatau ʻo e koloa ko ia.

Kapau ʻoku lahi ʻaupito ʻa e ʻai takai fano ʻo e fie maʻu (D), ʻoku ʻuhinga ia ʻe liliu lahi ʻa e fie maʻu ʻi he ʻalu ʻa e totongi. ʻOku ʻikai totonu ke ʻoatu ha tukuhau ki he koloa pehē, he ʻe mole lahi ʻa e fakatau.

Pea kapau ʻoku fuʻu siʻi ʻa e ʻai takai fano ʻo e fie maʻu (A), ʻoku ʻuhinga ia ʻoku ʻikai liliu lahi ʻa e fie maʻu ʻi he ʻalu ʻa e totongi. ʻE lava ke ʻoatu ha tukuhau ki he koloa pehē, kae ʻoku ʻikai ko e tali totonu ia.

B.7.5 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Ke fakaʻilongaʻi e vave ʻo e proton hili ʻene hu ki he feituʻu hiki fakamakinito, ʻoku fiemaʻu ke tau ngāue ʻaki e fōmula ʻo e vave fakakulupu ʻo e ngaahi mīsini fakakulupu.

ʻOku fokotuʻu ʻe he fōmula ko ení:

v = v_0 + ωr

ʻAia,
v = vave fakakulupu ʻo e proton
v_0 = vave kamata ʻo e proton
ω = fēfakafakakulupu (ω = qB/m)
r = lahi ʻo e tuliki ʻo e vave kamata

ʻOku foaki ʻa e ngaahi mahu ko ení:
v_0 = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s
B = 1.5 T
θ = 30°
m = masi ʻo e proton = 1.67 × 10^-27 kg
q = ingatonu ʻo e proton = 1.6 × 10^-19 C

Ke fakaʻilongaʻi e vave fakakulupu ω:
ω = qB/m
   = (1.6 × 10^-19 C)(1.5 T) / (1.67 × 10^-27 kg)
   = 1.44 × 10^7 rad/s

Ke fakaʻilongaʻi e lahi ʻo e tuliki r:
r = v_0 sinθ / ω
  = (1.5 × 10^6 m/s) sin30° / (1.44 × 10^7 rad/s)
  = 0.018 m = 1.8 cm

Fakaʻilongaʻi e vave fakakulupu v hili ʻa e 4 sekoni:
v = v_0 + ωr
   = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s + (1.44 × 10^7 rad/s)(0.018 m)
   = 1.5 × 10^6 + 2.6 × 10^5 m/s
   = 1.76 × 10^6 m/s

Ko e tali totonu ko e C. 1.5 × 10^6 m/s

Question:

Ko ia ai, ʻoku ne fakaʻosi ʻaki ʻoku ʻikai ke talangofua ʻa e ngaahi sitika ki he ngaahi fie maʻu ʻa e spicy. Hili ha uike ʻe tolu mei ai, naʻe faile ʻe he tokotaha ʻoku teu papi ʻa e suti ʻi he malaʻe fakavahe ʻo e puleʻanga ki he kau ʻofisa fili ʻo e Siteiti ʻo pehe ʻoku maumauʻi ʻe heʻenau fakaʻuhingaʻi ʻo e Siteiti statute ʻa e Konisitutone ʻo e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti. Question:

B.ʻOku fie maʻu ʻe Glycolysis ʻa e NADP +

GivenAnswer:

Ke fakamatala'i, ko e glycolysis ko e sio'ata 'uluaki 'o e metabolic pathway 'oku ngaahi ai 'a e ATP mei he glucose. 'Oku cleaved 'a e glucose ki he pyruvate 'i he glycolysis 'i he ngaahi sio'ata lahi.

Question:

Neongo naʻe sio ʻa e fakaʻiloa ki he faingataʻaʻia ʻa hono ʻilamutu, ka naʻe ʻikai ke ne feinga ke fakahaofi ia. Naʻe faifai pe pea fakafatongiaʻaki ʻa e fakaʻiloa ʻi he manslaughter. ʻI he faingataʻa, naʻe fakamoʻoni ʻa e fakaʻiloa naʻa ne fuʻu ʻohovale ʻi heʻene sio ki he to hono ʻilamutu ʻo ofi ki he loli veve pea ʻikai ke ne lava ʻo ngaue kae ʻoua kuo fuʻu tomui. Hili e fakamoʻoni ʻa e fakaʻiloa, naʻe fakamoʻoni ha fakamoʻoni taukei ki he maluʻi ʻoku ʻikai ko ha meʻa foʻou ʻa e ngaahi toʻonga ʻa e fakaʻiloa ʻi he taimi ʻoku hoko ai ha meʻa fakaʻohovale moʻoni. Kapau ʻoku tui ʻa e kau sula ki he fakamoʻoni ʻa e fakaʻiloa mo ʻene fakamoʻoni taukei, ko e maluʻi lelei taha ʻa e fakaʻiloa ko e fe ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni?
A.Naʻe faingataʻaʻia ʻa e fakaʻiloa ʻi he toʻonga fakavalevale fakataimi.
B.Naʻe ʻikai maʻu ʻe he fakaʻiloa ʻa e tuʻunga fakaʻatamai ʻoku fie maʻu ki he tuʻutuʻuni ʻo e hia.
C.Naʻe ʻikai ke loto tauʻataina ʻa e ʻikai ke ngaue ʻa e fakaʻiloa.
D.Naʻe fiefia ʻa e moʻua ʻo e fakaʻiloa ʻi he fakaʻuli ʻa e loli.
GivenAnswer:
ʻI heʻeku vakai ki he ngaahi fakamatala kuo ʻoatu, ʻoku maluʻi lelei taha ʻa e fakaʻiloa ʻi he tuʻunga B: "Naʻe ʻikai maʻu ʻe he fakaʻiloa ʻa e tuʻunga fakaʻatamai ʻoku fie maʻu ki he tuʻutuʻuni ʻo e hia."

ʻOku ʻasi mei he fakamatala naʻe ʻohovale ʻa e fakaʻiloa ʻi heʻene sio ki he ʻilamutu ʻoku lavea ʻo ofi ki he loli veve ka naʻe ʻikai ke ne lava ʻo ngaue ke fakahaofi ia. Naʻe fakamoʻoniʻi foki ʻe ha fakamoʻoni taukei ʻoku ʻikai foʻou ʻeni ʻa e toʻonga ʻa e fakaʻiloa ʻi he ngaahi tuʻunga fakaʻohovale.

ʻOku ʻasi mei he tuʻutuʻuni faihia naʻe ʻoatu, ʻoku ʻikai haʻisia ha taha kapau "ʻoku ʻikai te ne malava lahi ke houngaʻia ʻi he taʻetotonu ʻo ʻene tōʻongá, pe ke fakatatau ʻene tōʻongá ki he ngaahi fiemaʻu ʻa e laó" koeʻuhi ko e mahaki fakaʻatamai pe fehālaaki. Kapau naʻe ʻikai maʻu ʻe he fakaʻiloa ʻa e tuʻunga fakaʻatamai ʻoku fie maʻu ke ne houngaʻia ʻene tōʻonga ki he lao, ʻe maluʻi ia mei he hia.

Question:

GivenAnswer:

Kapau ʻoku ou sio ki he ngaahi taʻu ko iá, ʻoku ʻasi mai ʻoku fakamuimui taha ʻa e nofo ʻa e faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá ʻi ʻAositelelia. Ka ʻoku ʻikai ke u ʻiloʻi pe ko e tali totonu ia pe ʻikai.

Question:

GivenAnswer:
D. ʻIkai ke hala, ʻikai ke hala

Naʻe ʻikai ke hala ʻa e fokotuʻutuʻu 1 koeʻuhí he ʻoku maʻu ʻe he kakai ʻa e totonu ke ngaʻunu ʻa e meʻakai ʻoku ʻikai ke malu ʻi honau ʻapi pē ʻanautolu. ʻOku ʻikai ko ha hia ia ʻi he anga ʻo e ngaahi lao fakaeangamaʻa.

Pehē foki ki he fokotuʻutuʻu 2, ʻoku ʻikai ke hala ʻa e fakakaukau pē ke kamata ha vela ʻi he vaotaá. Kaeʻoua ke ngaue ʻaki ia, ʻoku ʻikai lava ke fakahoko ha hia ai. ʻOku maʻu ʻe he kakai ʻa e totonu ke fakakaukau pehē ʻi honau loto pē ʻanautolu.

Kātaki ʻo fakaʻapaʻapa ʻa e ngaahi lao mo e ngaahi tuʻunga moʻui fakaeangamaʻa ʻi hoʻo feituʻú pea ʻoua ʻe fai ha ngaahi ngāue ʻoku fakatuʻutāmaki ki ai.

Question:

A.Kuo lipooti ke fekauʻaki mo ha fracture maʻolunga ange mo e moʻui fakamatelie maʻolunga ange ʻi ha ngaahi ako siʻi
B.ʻI he lolotonga ʻo e taʻu hongofulu tupu ʻoku hange ʻoku fekauʻaki ia mo e hui maʻolunga ange ko density ʻi he moʻui kimui ange
C.ʻOku fekauʻaki maʻu pe ia mo ha tuʻunga maʻulalo ange ʻo e fasi

GivenAnswer:
Ngata pē ke u fakaʻilongaʻi ʻoku ʻikai ke u maʻu ha fakamatala pau ke tali ki he fehuʻi ko ení. Neongo iá, ʻoku ou lava ʻo vahevahe ʻeku ʻilo fakalūkufua fekauʻaki mo e huʻakau:

ʻOku ʻiloa ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi konga lelei mo kovi ʻo e huʻakau ki he moʻui lelei. ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi faingataʻa kau ki he huʻakau maʻolunga ʻo hangē ko e malohi ʻo e hū, puke fefeka, mo e ngaahi palopalema ki he fanga ki he sino. Kapau ʻoku ʻi ai haʻo ngaahi fehuʻi kehe fekauʻaki mo e huʻakau, te u fiefia ke tokoni kapau te u lava. Ka ʻoku totonu ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e fakamatala mei he kau puleʻanga moʻui lelei koeʻuhi ko ʻenau ʻilo fakapalofesinale.

Question:
Naʻe lavea lahi ha fakaʻuli ʻe taha ʻi he fakaʻuli motorist. Naʻe fakamatalaʻi ʻa e motorist ʻi heʻene fononga ʻi he hala hala pea totongi ha lelei. Naʻe ʻikai tali ʻe he kautaha maluʻi ʻa e totongi taʻe ʻi ai ha fakamatala. Naʻe foaki ʻe ha kau sula ʻa e claimant naʻe lavea $200,000. Naʻe maʻu ʻe he claimant naʻe lavea ha ngaue ne fakamoʻoni hingoa ki ai mei he motorist taʻetokanga ki he claimant ha faʻahinga totonu pe naʻe maʻu ʻe he motorist ki heʻene insurer. ʻE ngalingali nai ʻe fakamalohiʻi ʻe he fakamaauʻanga ʻa e kautaha maluʻi ke nau totongi kakato ʻa e lahi ʻo e ngaahi fili ʻa e kau sula ki he tokotaha naʻe lavea ʻi he ngaahi moʻoniʻi meʻa ko ʻeni?
A.Ko e fakangatangata ʻo e tuʻutuʻuni ko e $15,000 pea ko e meʻa pe ia ʻe lava ke tanaki ʻe he tokotaha kafo ʻoku ʻikai ha ngaue ki he tui kovi ʻi ha aleapau maluʻi.
B.ʻOku breached ʻe he kautaha maluʻi ʻa e fuakava ʻo e tui lelei mo e ngaue lelei ʻoku pau ʻi he aleapau maluʻi kotoa pe pea kuo pau ke ne totongi kakato ʻa e lahi ʻo e fakamau.

GivenAnswer:

4. ʻOku ʻikai totonu ke fakaʻatā ʻe he fakangatangata ʻo e tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e kautaha maluʻi mei heʻene ngaahi fatongia kehe ʻi he aleapau pea mo ʻene ngaahi fatongia fakalao.

Question:

Naʻe ʻalu e kau ʻofisa polisi ki he ʻapi ʻo e tangata ʻo lomiʻi e fafangu ʻo e matapaa. ʻI he ʻikai ke tali mai ʻe ha taha, naʻe hu mai ʻa e kau polisi ʻo hu ki he nofoʻanga. Naʻa nau kumi ʻa e ngaahi loki ʻi he fungavaka ʻuluaki pea ʻikai maʻu ha fakamoʻoni incriminating, pea nau hu ki tuʻa ʻo fakatokangaʻi ha huʻanga mavahe ʻo aʻu ki he fungavaka ua ʻo e nofoʻanga. Naʻa nau kaka hake ʻi he sitepú ʻo hū ki ha loki ʻi ʻolunga. Naʻe maʻu ʻe he kau ʻofisa ʻi he loto loki ha stash ʻo e faitoʻo konatapu ʻoku tokoto ʻi ha funga toloa. ʻI he hoko atu e fekumi ʻa e kau ʻofisa ki he loki mohe, naʻe hu mai ʻa e fakaʻiloa ki he loki. Naʻe ʻeke ange ʻe he kau polisi ki he fakaʻiloa pe ko e tangata ia. Naʻe ʻiloʻi ia ʻe he fakaʻiloa pea ne talaange ki he kau polisi ʻoku nau ʻi hono loki mohe pea naʻa ne nofoʻi ʻa e fungavaka ua ʻo e nofoʻanga. Naʻe fakamatalaʻi ʻe he fakaʻiloa naʻe nofo ʻa e tangata ʻi he fungavaka ʻuluaki pea naʻe mavahe hono nofoʻanga mei he fakaʻiloa. Neongo ia, naʻe tuku popula ʻa e fakaʻiloa pea tukuakiʻi ia ke ne maʻu ʻa e faitoʻo konatapu. Kuo fai ʻe he fakaʻiloa ha fokotuʻu ke ʻoua naʻa fakakau ʻa e faitoʻo konatapu mei hono fakahu ki ha fakamoʻoni. ʻOku totonu ke hoko ʻa e fokotuʻu ʻa e fakaʻiloa
A.tali, koeʻuhi he naʻe ʻikai ke fakahingoa ʻe he fakamafaiʻi ʻa e fakaʻiloa.
B.foaki, koeʻuhi he naʻe ʻikai ke fakamatalaʻi ʻe he fakamafaiʻi ʻa e specificity ʻa e feituʻu ke kumi ai.
C.ʻikai tali, koeʻuhi he naʻe tui ʻa e kau polisi naʻa nau fekumi ki he nofoʻanga ʻo e tangata ʻi he taimi naʻa nau hu ai ki he nofoʻanga ʻo e fakaʻiloa.
D.ʻikai tali, koeʻuhi he naʻe ʻaonga ʻa e fakamafaiʻi pea foaki ʻi he ngaue ngalingali fai fehokotaki.
GivenAnswer:
C. 'Ikai tali, koe'uhi he na'e tui 'a e kau polisi na'a nau fekumi ki he nofo'anga 'o e tangata 'i he taimi na'a nau hu ai ki he nofo'anga 'o e faka'iloa.

'Oku totonu ke 'ikai tali 'a e fokotuʻu 'a e fakaʻiloa ke 'oua 'e fakakau 'a e faitoʻo konatapu mei hono fakahū ki ha fakamoʻoni, koeʻuhi he naʻe tui 'a e kau polisi na'a nau fekumi ki he nofoʻanga 'o e tangata 'i he taimi naʻa nau hu ai ki he nofoʻanga 'o e fakaʻiloa. Naʻa nau maʻu 'a e faitoʻo konatapu 'i he feituʻu naʻa nau tui ko e nofoʻanga ia 'o e tangata, pea 'oku totonu ke ngofua 'a e fakamoʻoni ko ia.

Question:

Hili ia, naʻe fakaʻilo ʻe he fefine ʻa e koloa ki ha ngaahi lavea fakatautaha. Naʻe pehe ʻe he fefine ʻi hono suti, naʻa ne humu ʻi ha kane vali naʻe tokoto ʻi ha taha ʻo e ngaahi tafaʻaki. ʻI he faingataʻa, naʻe ui ʻe he fefine ha kasitoma ʻe taha ke ne fakamoʻoniʻi lolotonga ʻene fakatau naʻa ne fanongo ki ha manioke, naʻa ne tafoki ʻo sio ki he to ʻa e fefine ʻi he faliki. Naʻa ne toe fakamoʻoni foki naʻa ne sio ki ha kane vali ʻoku tokoto ʻi ha ngaahi fute siʻi mei he vaʻe ʻo e fefine. ʻI he sivi ʻo e kolosi, naʻe fai ʻe he kasitoma ha fakafetongi fakafekiki mo e loea ʻa e koloa. ʻ I hono ʻ eke ange ʻ ene fakakaukau ki he meʻa naʻá ne fakatupunga ʻ a e tō ʻ a e fefiné, naʻe fakamoʻoni ʻ a e kasitomaá, "Naʻá ne tō koeʻuhi naʻá ne humu ʻ i he kané. Naʻe fai leva ʻe he loea ʻa e koloa ki he kasitoma ʻa e fehuʻi ko ʻeni: "Kapau naʻe ʻikai ke ke sio ki he fononga ʻa e fefine ʻi he kane, ʻoku ke ʻilo fefe naʻa ne to koeʻuhi ko ia?" A.Naʻe fakaafeʻi e tali ʻa e kasitoma ʻe he fehuʻi ʻa e loea ʻa e koloa.

GivenAnswer:

Question:

B.ngaahi lekooti fakafaitoʻo ʻoku ʻikai fakahāhāhol

GivenAnswer:
Ko e ngaahi fakamatala fakatāutaha ʻoku ʻikai totonu ke u hū ki ai pe fakahā ʻi he founga ʻoku maumauʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi lao ki he maʻuʻanga fakalao mo e totonu fakalao. Kapau ʻoku ʻi ai ha ngaahi fakamatala fakatāutaha ʻoku totonu ke malu, te u fai ʻa e meʻa totonu ʻo ʻikai fakahā ia.

Neongo ia, te u fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga fakamatala fakatāutaha ʻoku ʻikai totonu ke hū ki ai ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi lao mo e ngaahi tuʻunga ʻulungāanga. ʻOku kau ki ai ʻa e ngaahi lekooti fakafaitoʻo, ngaahi tohi ʻakauni fakatāutaha, ngaahi lesisita pisinisi ʻoku ʻikai totonu ke fakalao, pea mo e ngaahi fakamatala malu kehe. ʻOku totonu ke malu mo fakaʻapaʻapa ʻa e ngaahi fakamatala fakatāutaha pehē.

Question:
ʻOku ʻilo ʻe ha tokotaha ngaue ʻi he kautaha ngaohiʻanga koloa lahi ʻa e ngaue ʻoku taʻeoli, pea ne fua pe ʻa e ngaue ki he paʻanga. ʻOku minimally ʻa e tokotaha ngaue, pea ʻoku ʻikai fakaʻaiʻai ia ke ne ʻomi ha tuʻunga maʻolunga taha pe lelei ange. A.fai ha totongi mo ha fakaʻaiʻai ki ha ola lahi ange
B.toe fokotuʻutuʻu foʻou ʻa e ngaue ke ʻomi ha faingataʻa mo ha ongoʻi lavameʻa
C.fakalahi e ngaahi faingamalie ki he feohi fakasosiale
D.ʻoange ki he tokotaha ngaue ha ngaue ʻoku ne toʻotoʻo ha ngeia lahi ange
GivenAnswer:
Fakatatau ki he fakakaukau ʻa Frederick Herzberg, ko e founga lelei tahu ke fakatupu ha fakaʻaiʻai ki he tokotaha ngaue ko ia ʻoku D) ʻoange ki he tokotaha ngaue ha ngaue ʻoku ne toʻotoʻo ha ngeia lahi ange.

ʻOku tui ʻa Herzberg ko e ngaahi ʻulungaanga fakalaumalie ʻoku ne fakatupu ha fakaʻaiʻai ki ha taha, ʻo hangē ko hono fokotuʻutuʻu foʻou ʻa e ngaue ke ʻomi ai ha faingataʻa mo ha ongoʻi lavameʻa, pea ʻoange ki he tokotaha ngaue ha ngaue ʻoku ne toʻotoʻo ha ngeia lahi ange. Ko e ngaahi ʻulungaanga fakalaumalie ko ia ʻoku ne ui ko e "fakatupu fakaʻaiʻai" ʻoku kau ai ʻa e lavameʻa, ngaue ʻoku ʻaonga, fakalakalakaʻi, pea mo e tupu fakalaumalie.

Kapau ʻoku ʻikai fakaʻaiʻai ʻa e tokotaha ngaue, ʻoku ʻikai ko e totongi pe ko e ngaahi ʻulungaanga fakavahaʻapangai ʻe tokoni ki ai, ka ʻoku totonu ke fakalahi ʻa e ngaahi ʻulungaanga fakalaumalie ʻi hono ngaue.

Question:
Ko ha tangata faama ʻ oku lolotonga ʻ i ai ʻ a e lēkooti ʻ o ha konga kelekele naʻe vaheʻi ko e "A. " Ko e māʻolunga ange ia ʻ i he ongo koloa kaungāʻapi ʻ i ha moʻunga. " ko hono olá, naʻe fakaʻilo ai ʻ e he tokotaha fāmá ʻ a e tangata faama ʻ i he faihalá ʻ o lotu ki he ngaahi maumau naʻe fakatupunga ʻ e he fakatafeʻanga vaí. ʻOku totonu ke fai ʻa e fakamāú ki he
A.ʻa e tangata faama, koeʻuhi he naʻe ʻikai ke kau ʻi he ngaue ʻa e tangata fama ha ngaahi fuakava naʻa ne taʻofi hono fakaʻaongaʻi ʻe he tangata faama ʻa e kelekele.

Question:
Ko e fe ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni ʻoku ne fakamatalaʻi lelei taha ʻa e tukunga hili hono ʻohake ʻo e totongi ʻi ha koloa ʻoku ʻi ai ha fie maʻu inelastic?

B.ʻE tupulaki ʻa e lahi ʻo e meʻa ʻoku fie maʻu.
C.ʻE holo e fakakatoa ʻo e paʻanga hu mai.

GivenAnswer:

'I he'ene 'i ai ha fie ma'u inelastic ki ha koloa, 'oku 'uhinga ia 'oku si'i si'i pe 'a e liliu 'i he fie ma'u ki he koloa ko ia 'o fakafou 'i ha liliu 'i hono totongi.

Kapau 'oku hiki hake 'a e totongi 'o ha koloa 'oku 'i ai ha fie ma'u inelastic, he'ikai lahi 'aupito 'a e liliu 'i he lahi 'o e me'a 'oku fie ma'u, he ko e koloa ko ia 'oku mahu'inga ia ki he kau fakatau. Ko ia, 'oku tonu 'a e tali 'A' he 'ikai ke liliu lahi 'a e lahi 'o e me'a 'oku fie ma'u 'i he hiki hake 'a e totongi.

'Oku 'ikai tonu 'a e ngaahi tali kehe:

B. 'E tupulaki 'a e lahi 'o e me'a 'oku fie ma'u - 'Oku 'ikai ko ia 'a e me'a 'e hoko kapau 'oku inelastic 'a e fie ma'u.

C. 'E holo 'a e fakakatoa 'o e pa'anga hu mai - 'E si'i pe 'a e liliu 'i he pa'anga hu mai kapau 'oku si'i 'a e liliu 'i he lahi 'o e me'a 'oku fie ma'u.

D. He 'ikai liliu 'a e fakakatoa 'o e pa'anga hu mai - 'E liliu si'i pe 'a e pa'anga hu mai 'o fakafou 'i he si'i liliu 'i he lahi 'o e me'a 'oku fie ma'u.

Question:
Ko e fe ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni ʻoku ne poupouʻi ʻa e fakakikihi ki he unilateralism ʻAmelika?
A.Angaʻofa hegemony
B.ʻIkai ke ola lelei ʻa e multilateralism
C.Malohi ʻo ʻAmelika
D.Kotoa e ngaahi meʻa ʻi ʻolungá
GivenAnswer:
ʻOku ʻikai ha taha pau ʻe lava ʻo poupouʻi ʻa e unilateralism ʻAmelika. ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi ʻuhinga kehekehe ʻe lava ke ne ʻomi ʻa e fakakaukau ko ia:

A. Angaʻofa hegemony - Kapau ʻoku mahino kiate kinautolu ʻoku malohi taha ʻa ʻAmelika, ʻe lava ke nau pehē ʻoku totonu ke nau muʻomuʻa ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa.

B. ʻIkai ke ola lelei ʻa e multilateralism - Kapau ʻoku nau mamata ʻoku faingataʻa ke fengāueʻaki mo e ngaahi fonua kehe, ʻe lava ke nau pehē ʻoku lelei ange ke ngāue ʻa ʻAmelika ʻatāʻatā.

C. Malohi ʻo ʻAmelika - Kapau ʻoku nau tui ʻoku malohi ʻaupito ʻa ʻAmelika, ʻe lava ke nau pehē ʻoku totonu ke nau fai ʻenau lava ke muʻomuʻa.

D. Kotoa e ngaahi meʻa ʻi ʻolunga - ʻE lava ke kau ki ai ʻa e ngaahi ʻuhinga kehekehe ʻoku ʻoatu ʻi ʻolunga.

ʻOku ʻikai ha taha pau ʻe totonu ke poupouʻi ʻa e unilateralism. Ko e meʻa mahu̒inga ke mahino ki he ngaahi ʻuhinga kehekehe ʻoku ʻomai ai ʻa e fakakaukau ko ia pea fakalaulauloto ki hono ngaahi lelei mo kovi.

ʻI he fakamatala kuo ʻoatu, ʻoku ʻikai ha fakahinohino ʻoku ne fakahā ʻoku ʻi ai ha mahaki ʻoku fiema ai ha faito'o. ʻOku fakahā ʻe he ngaahi fakamatala ʻoku ʻi ai ha mamahi ʻi he kouʻahe toʻomataʻu mo e kaungaʻo ʻa ia ʻoku faʻa fakatupu ʻe he ngaahi ʻuhinga ʻoku ʻoatu.

Kapau ʻoku ʻikai ha toe fakamatala ʻoku fakahā ʻoku ʻi ai ha mahaki ʻoku fiema ai ha faito'o, ʻe lelei taha ke fakalaulauloto ki he ngaahi founga fakanatula ke fakafiemalie'i ʻa e mamahi pehē:

1. Fakaʻehiʻehi mei he ngaahi ʻuhinga ʻoku fakatupu mamahi (ʻea momoko, mama, ala ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai, fulunifo hono nifo, etc.)
2. Ngaahi founga fakanatula ke fakafiemalie'i ʻa e mamahi (fakamokomoko, fakamaama ʻa e konga ʻoku mamahi, ngaahi akupanisio fakanatula, etc.)
3. Fakaʻaongaʻi ha faito'o ʻoku faʻa fakatau ʻata ke fakafiemalie'i ʻa e mamahi (ibuprofen, acetaminophen, etc.) ka ʻoku totonu ke muʻomuʻa fakalaulauloto ki he ngaahi ola kovi fakalūkufua.

Kapau ʻoku ʻikai ke fiemalie ʻa e mamahi ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi founga fakanatula mo e ngaahi faito'o ʻata, ʻe lelei leva ke toe ʻalu ki ha toketā ke fakaʻilongaʻi kapau ʻoku ʻi ai ha mahaki ʻoku fiema ai ha faito'o malohi ange.

Question:
Kuo fakahaaʻi ʻe he fekumi ʻi he lea fakafonua hono ua ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni fekauʻaki mo e fanau ʻoku nau maʻu ha lea fakafonua hono ua
A.ʻOku toe toloi ʻenau fakalakalaka fakaʻatamai
B.ʻOku lelei ange ʻenau articulation ʻi he fanau ʻoku ʻikai ke nau lea
C.ʻOku ʻikai ha ola ʻo ʻenau poto he lea fakafonua ʻi he vave hono maʻu ʻo e lea fakafonua hono ua
D.Kuo nau fakatupulaki e feliliuaki fakaʻatamai
GivenAnswer:
ʻOku ʻikai ha tali totonu ʻe taha ki he fehuʻi ko ʻeni. ʻOku faingataʻa ke fakapapauʻi ha ola pau ʻo e lea fakafonua hono ua ki he fakalakalaka ʻa e fanau, he ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi ʻulungaanga kehekehe ʻo e ngaahi ʻatamai fakalaumalie, fakasōsiale mo e ʻatamai fakaʻatamai.

Kae kehe, ʻoku lahi ʻa e ngaahi fakakaukau kehekehe ʻoku ʻomai ʻe he kau fakamāhino fekauʻaki mo e ola ʻo e lea fakafonua hono ua:

A. ʻOku pehē ʻe he niʻihi ʻoku toloi ʻe ia ʻa e fakalakalaka fakaʻatamai ʻo e fanau koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi pole ʻoku nau fepakipakiʻi ʻi he fevahevaheʻaki ʻo e ngaahi lea.

B. ʻOku tui ʻe he niʻihi ʻoku lelei ange ʻa e articulation ʻa e fanau ʻoku nau lea fakafonua hono ua koeʻuhi ko ʻenau maʻu ʻa e ngaahi founga kehekehe ʻo e leaʻanga.

C. ʻOku pehē ʻe he niʻihi ʻoku ʻikai ha ola ʻo e poto ʻi he lea fakafonua ki he vave hono maʻu ʻo e lea fakafonua hono ua, ka ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi ʻulungaanga fakafoʻituitui.

D. ʻOku tui ʻe he niʻihi ʻoku fakatupulaki ʻe he lea fakafonua hono ua ʻa e feliliuaki fakaʻatamai ʻa e fanau koeʻuhi ko ʻenau maʻu ʻa e ngaahi founga kehekehe ʻo e fakakaukau.

Koeʻuhi ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai ha tali ʻe taha ʻoku totonu ki he fehuʻi ko ʻeni. ʻOku fakamahinoʻi ʻe he ngaahi tali kehekehe ʻa e ngaahi ʻataʻatā kehekehe ʻo e ola ʻo e lea fakafonua hono ua.
